did.unittitle: M. Antoinette Johnson letter to Alberta Clark
did.abstract: Letter from M. Antoinette Johnson, O.S.U, to Alberta Clark, Portland, Oregon, 4 pp, 31 July 1946, thanking Clark for packages of school and sewing supplies sent to St. Mary's Mission, Akulurak, Alaska and describing a three-week fish camp and planned berrying expedition with comments on the wholesomeness of the native Alaskan diet.

scopecontent.p: Letter from M. Antoinette Johnson, O.S.U, to Alberta Clark, Portland, Oregon, 4 pp, 31 July 1946, thanking Clark for packages of school and sewing supplies sent to St. Mary's Mission, Akulurak, Alaska and describing a three-week fish camp and planned berrying expedition with comments on the wholesomeness of the native Alaskan diet.

acqinfo.p: Gift of Goodwill Industries of Oregon, June 1987.

accessrestrict.p: This collection is open to the public.

prefercite.p: M. Antoinette Johnson letter to Alberta Clark, Mss 1500, Oregon Historical Society Research Library.
